title: Handle a Purchase Order Cancellation
description: A procurement manager needs to cancel a purchase order that was placed with a supplier but is no longer needed.

tasks.description: Identify the purchase order to be cancelled.
Check the PO status to ensure the supplier has not already shipped it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the order is not yet shipped.

tasks.description: Contact the supplier to formally cancel the purchase order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a cancellation request to the supplier.

tasks.description: Update the status of the PO in the system to 'Cancelled'.
